lead_paragraph: The Brazilian swimmer Rebeca Gusmao has received her second two-year doping suspension after a positive test for testosterone at a 2006 competition. The ban was announced months after Gusmao was suspended for testing positive for the same substance before the 2007 Pan American Games in Rio de Janeiro. Gusmao could be banned from the sport if the current rulings stand.
